channel.title: Xp rates
channel.description: How would I change the xp rate for attack,strenghth,magic,prayer,defence and range? I;ve looked all over and I cant find it,Though I know its possible to chenge it.

item.title: Xp rates
item.dc:creator: @needhoster needhoster
item.description:
@needhoster wrote:

wow… you people are sad! search this up:

if (FightType == 1) // Accurate

you’ll get something like this

if (FightType == 1) // Accurate { TotalExp = (double) (15000000 * hitDiff); TotalExp = (double) (TotalExp * CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), playerAttack); } else if (FightType == 2) // Agressive
change the 15000000 to whatever you want.

Read full topic

item.title: Xp rates
item.dc:creator: @xx_Santa_pker_xX xx Santa pker xX
item.description:
@xx_Santa_pker_xX wrote:

[quote=“gamma, post:3, topic:242480”][quote author=jjones10 link=topic=318823.msg2529039#msg2529039 date=1226360897]
what source are you using? it is different to find on almost all sources
[/quote]

no its not.

Create a new account and attack something one time and see how much exp you get. Search that in client.java, and there you go.[/quote]

your wrong. It does matter what source your using. because the delta scape source one is diffrent then the richscape one. but im sure most silab servers have the same thing since most are czar lol.

Read full topic
